**Confidence: High**

This is the biggest mismatch on the board by my numbers, and it's practically screaming for us to take the Grizzlies catching a point. Don't overthink it, load up!

### 2. VALUE PLAY

**Pick: Oklahoma City Thunder Moneyline (+300)**
**Win Probability: 67.1%**

So tell me, why are they priced at +300 on the moneyline? That's an implied win probability of only 25%! This is an absolute gift from the bookmakers, a statistical goldmine. Take the league's best team at ridiculous underdog odds. This is a can't-miss value play!
